title: Bug 109718: Text item tips displayed on one line instead of formatting correctly
description:
INTRODUCTION 32. SOME OF THE ERROR MESSAGE DOESN'T HAVE ENOUGH INFORMATION FOR USERS TO IDENTIFY THE ERROR. 42.5 ADD JAVASCRIPT OBJECT 42.6 SUPPORT DROP IN THE GROUP HEADER 42.7 PROVIDE UNDOABLE TRANSACTION 42.8 USER PROPERTY REVISION 52.9 HELP GUI TO FILTRATE THE UNNECESSARY NOTIFICATIONS 53. ELEMENT EXTENSION 65. Save and put mouse on the text item

Expected Result: The tips should be displayed in the given format.
Actual Result: The tips are displayed on one line.
OB: The tips of the text item are displayed on one line instead of being in the specified format.
EB: The parameter for the element name and property name should be provided in order to properly format the tips.
SR:
1. Insert a large amount of content in a text item.
2. Save the changes.
3. Place the mouse pointer on the text item.
